unnormalised: Hey guys, if you're starting tailoring, remember a few key measurements. You'll need the bust (in inches, say 34"), waist (maybe 28"), and hip (around 38"). Don't forget the shoulder width, like 15 cm, and sleeve length, perhaps 22 inches for a 3/4th sleeve. Also crucial is the length of the garment - could be 40" for a kurta or shorter, maybe 20 cm, for a blouse. Getting these right makes all the difference! Good luck!
